T02khasrpsu:1: iha śubhaṅkaranāmā upāsakaḥ śubhakarmakārī karuṇāyamānaḥ sa kila potalakagamanodyataḥ /
T02khasrpsu:4: mā gaccha tvam ihāsmān vairocanābhisaṃbodhitantrarājakrameṇa sthāpaya tena mahān satvārtho bhaviṣyati /
T02khasrpsu:7: tatra bhagavataḥ sādhanāya dṛṛṣṭisaṃpattiḥ kriyate / tathā hi
T02khasrpsu:8: varaṃ bhikṣoḥ śīlavipattir na punar dṛṣṭivipattir iti /
T02khasrpsu:9: atas tatra tāvat kṣaṇikān nirātmakān sarvadharmān vyavalokya vyapagatasakalavikalpaḥ kṛpāśayo 'ho vatāmī satvāḥ kleśakarmādibhir upadrutāḥ /
T02khasrpsu:12: tato 'haṃ lokeśvaro bhūtvā teṣāṃ duḥkhādy apanayāmi /
T02khasrpsu:14: ity evaṃ pratijñāśayaṃ kṛtvā svahṛdi paṃkārajasahaśradalapadmavarāṭakamadhye akārajacandramaṇḍalopari āṃ tāṃ suṃ bhṛṃ haṃ iti pañca bījāni vinyasya
T02khasrpsu:15: etadraśmimālābhiḥ sañcodyānīya tān gurubuddhabodhisatvān gaganatale purovartinaḥ
T02khasrpsu:18: 'ham ity uccārya śūnyatābodhim kṛtvā bhagavān avalokiteśvaro yoginātmanā bhūyate /
T02khasrpsu:50: (Khs_13) oṃ maṇidhari vajriṇi rakṣa o māṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā //
T02khasrpsu:52: oṃ āgaccha bhagavan maṇḍalakasiṃhāsane oṃ āḥ iti mantrakṛtādhyeṣāṇāyāṃ kṛtamaṇḍalamadhyasiṃhāsanopari sahasradalapadmasthapañcātmakam pūjayed iti /
T02khasrpsu:62: oṃ āṃ tāṃ suṃ bhṛṃ haṃ phaṭ svāhā //
T02khasrpsu:63: oṃ sarvatathāgatasulalitanamitair namāmi bhagavantaṃ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ pratīccha kusumāñjalir nātha hoḥ /
T02khasrpsu:67: gṛhṇa gṛhṇa gṛhṇa ntu sarvabhautikā imaṃ baliṃ svāhā /
T02khasrpsu:69: atha pūjārambhakāle evam uccārya cittaṃ śodhanīyaṃ /
T02khasrpsu:74: tadā rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ syāt /
T02khasrpsu:75: iha sarva eva satvā rāgadveṣamohāśayāḥ // tathā hi
T02khasrpsu:77: dveṣajena rāgeṇa mohajena vaiśravaṇo yakṣo bhūtaḥ /
T02khasrpsu:78: ity ato rāgadveṣamohādīn parihṛtya cittaśuddhyā karuṇāyamānacittena sarvāṇy eva dānādikuśalamūlāni kartavyāni /
